block.p: N.B.A. LOS ANGELES CLIPPERS--Signed G Will Conroy. Waived C Zeljko Rebraca.

FOOTBALL N.F.L.--Announced the establishment player council consisting of six members: Troy Vincent; Donovin Darius of Jacksonville; Tony Richardson of Minnesota; Jeff Saturday of Indianapolis; Takeo Spikes of Philadelphia and James Thrash of Washington. CAROLINA PANTHERS--Agreed to terms with QB David Carr.

N.H.L. BOSTON BRUINS--Sent G Hannu Toivonen to Providence (AHL). BUFFALO SABRES--Sent F Clarke MacArthur to Rochester (AHL). DETROIT RED WINGS--Signed C Pavel Datsyuk to a seven-year contract extension. TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING--Signed D Vladmir Mihalik.
Major League Soccer TORONTO FC--Traded MF Jose Cancela to the Colorado Rapids for a youth development roster spot that is secured until 2009.
ARKANSAS--Named Zenarae Antoine women's assistant basketball coach.

CAROLINA PANTHERS--Agreed to terms with QB David Carr.

N.H.L. BOSTON BRUINS--Sent G Hannu Toivonen to Providence (AHL). BUFFALO SABRES--Sent F Clarke MacArthur to Rochester (AHL). DETROIT RED WINGS--Signed C Pavel Datsyuk to a seven-year contract extension. TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING--Signed D Vladmir Mihalik.
Major League Soccer TORONTO FC--Traded MF Jose Cancela to the Colorado Rapids for a youth development roster spot that is secured until 2009.
ARKANSAS--Named Zenarae Antoine women's assistant basketball coach.
